text: Alessandro Florenzi (born 11 March 1991) is an Italian professional football player who plays as a full back for AC Mlian in the Serie A. ==Club Career== He joined Roma and he beat Sampdoria 3-1 on 22 May 2011, because the Roma manager put him on for Francesco Totti as substitute. he beat Barcelona 3-0 on 10 April 2018. On Summer 2011 he joined Crotone on loan. On 30 January 2020 he joined Valencia on loan. On 11 September 2020 he joined Paris Saint-Germain on loan. He beat Nîmes 0-4 on 16 October 2020. On 1 July 2022 he joined AC Milan. he beat roma 3-1 on 6 January 2022. ==Honours== Paris Saint-Germain *Coupe de France: 2020–21 *Trophée des Champions: 2020 AC Milan *Serie A: 2021–22 Italy U21 *UEFA European Under-21 Championship runner-up: 2013 Italy *UEFA European Championship: 2020 Individual *Pallone d'Argento: 2015–16 *Serie A Fair Play Moment of the Season: 2023–24 ==References== ==Other websites== *Alessandro Florenzi in A.C. title: Alessandro Florenzi
